Package kse.utilclass.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MenuActionSource
    This interface describes a class which renders Action objects for the purpose of building a menu.
    MenuActivist
    This interface describes a class which renders a JMenu or a JPopupMenu from the parent MenuActionSource interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveJMenu
    This class can be used as super-class to any JMenu which loads its contents dynamically when the button (JMenu) is activated.
    AmpleEditorPane
    This extension of JEditorPane adds the following features to the editor field.
    AmpleEditorPane.ActionNames  
    AmpleTextArea
    This extension of JTextArea adds the following features to the editor field.
    AmpleTextArea.ActionNames  
    AutomoveAdapter
    Component adapter which realises movement of a target component in dependence of another component, here called "parent".
    BoxedFlowLayout
    A Layout which arranges added components in a grid style with a user defined amount of columns, where each column has the width of its widest component and each row has the height of its tallest component.
    ColorChooserDialog
    Color chooser dialog which incorporates ColorChooserPanel.
    ColorChooserPanel
    This JPanel allows to choose from a set of predefined colours (type Color by clicking on a corresponding button which is offered in a vertical list or grid of options.
    ColorSwatch
    An icon for painting a square swatch of a specified Color.
    FontChooser  
    HtmlDialogPanel
    A JPanel containing an optionally scrollable HTML browsing facility based on JEditorPane.
    TestAppl1  
    TestC_BoxedFlowLayout  
    VerticalFlowLayout
    A simple yet convincing VerticalFlowLayout.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AmpleEditorPane.StyledViewMode
    Styled documents are shown either in their source code or as the defined surface.
